title: Epitaxy Technician microLEDS, Augmented Reality
description: Be part of a diverse team that pushes boundaries, developing custom silicon solutions that power the future of Google's direct-to-consumer products. You'll contribute to the innovation behind products loved by millions worldwide. Your expertise will shape the next generation of hardware experiences, delivering unparalleled performance, efficiency, and integration. The AR Hardware - Raxium team is building a new type of display -- a beautiful, full color, and high resolution display that the world has never seen.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical, Process, or Manufacturing Engineering, or equivalent practical experience. Experience with semiconductor processing. Experience with operations of metrology tools and measurements.
preferred_qualifications: Certification in Hazardous Waste Operations and Emergency Response Standard (HAZWOPER). Experience in Electronics, Automotive Industry, or HVAC. Ability to work non-standard hours.
responsibilities: Process equipment operation, material characterization, and process monitoring. Collect process data to support development and operations. Work with engineers to conduct tests and experiments that support process improvement or process development. Perform transactions in Manufacturing Execution System (MES) for tracking wafers in the process through the Epitaxy area. Perform set-up, calibration, and minor routine preventative maintenance.
